item.description:
ORAGNIZER: Will
CONTACT: http://photo.meetup.c...
WHO: All members

my understanding is they will do a launch at around 6pm weather permitting, then at dusk do the Night Glow

Night Glow
A Night Glow isn't a ride, but it is one heck of a show. At dusk on Friday night, weather permitting, a half dozen or more balloons will inflate at Grimes Field. Once fully inflated, the propane burner is adjusted so as to create a white flame that illuminates the balloon and makes it glow. The night glow is free, the only stipulation is that the public must remain a safe distance away from the balloons while they are inflated.

out of all my Ballooon Festivals I've shot, I've yet to get a "Glow" done
~Will
item.name: Hillsborough Hot Air Balloon Festival - Evening Launch and "Glow"
